By the king. A proclamation. Containing his Majesties gracious pardon and indemnity Proclamations. 1679-07-27. Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Edinburgh, printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty, anno Dom. 1679. And re-printed at London, [London] : [1679]
Year of publication from Wing. Dated at end: the twenty-seventh day of July, one thousand, six hundred, seventy and nine. And of our reign, the threetieth-one [sic] year. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
